name: Rooftop Randy
description: Randy, a robot, is a proud dog owner. However, he cannot afford to pay for the dog's food. In order to stop his dog from starving, Randy must jump from rooftop to rooftop to collect enough forgotten valuables to feed his dog. However, he has to be careful. He is allergic to the sun, so he can't be out on the rooftops for too long. Also, sus imposters are out to kill him. Will Randy and his dog live another day?
